object.content: <ietext><text><P align=center><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 24px">Приветствуем, коллега! Мы рады снова видеть&nbsp;тебя на обучающем портале СДО!</SPAN></P></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P align=center><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">Слева находится 3&nbsp;раздела, которые необходимо пройти по порядку, для того, чтобы&nbsp;тебе был предоставлен доступ к окончательному&nbsp;тесту.</SPAN></P> <P align=center><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">Удачи!&nbsp;</SPAN></SPAN></P></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

object.content: <ietext><text><P><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Comic Sans MS; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><B><SPAN style="COLOR: #0083d7">СМАРТФОНЫ</SPAN></B></SPAN></P></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>
<ietext><text><P><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Comic Sans MS; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px">Тема обучения:</SPAN></P></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><B><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff">Смартфон (умный телефон)</SPAN> </B>— это телефон + компьютер.</SPAN></SPAN></P></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">При помощи смартфона вы можете работать с документами, смотреть фильмы, играть, искать полезную информацию и читать новости в сети интернет, получать доступ к электронной почте, где бы вы ни находились, общаться в социальных сетях...</SPAN> </SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">В общем, вы можете делать все то же самое, и <B><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff">даже больше</SPAN></B>,&nbsp;что и на обычном компьютере,&nbsp;но этот компьютер всегда с вами, благодаря своей легкости и компактности.</SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

object.design_content: Область нажатия

object.content: <ietext><text><P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">Смартфоны - это телефоны с достаточно развитой операционной системой (обеспечивает многозадачность).</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%">Смартфон поддерживает самые <B><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff">известные и полезные сервисы</B>,</SPAN> такие как:</SPAN></P>
<UL>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><B><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff">Dropbox</SPAN> </B>(для размещения файлов на удаленном сервере и возможности обмена информации);</SPAN></SPAN></DIV>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><B><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff">Facebook</SPAN> </B>(соц. сеть, позволяющая общаться с близкими);</SPAN></SPAN></DIV>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><B><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff">Instagram</SPAN></B> (позволяет пользователям снимать фото и видео, применять к ним фильтры и обмениваться с друзьями, а также выкладывать их&nbsp;в facebook, twitter и другие соц. сервисы) </SPAN></SPAN></DIV>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trajan Pro"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">и еще ОЧЕНЬ много других сервисов!</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></DIV></LI></UL></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">А так как смартфон оснащен множеством дополнительных датчиков и опций (камера, акселерометр), то после установки подходящей программы он превращается в:</SPAN></SPAN></P>
<UL>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18pt; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 18px"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">шагомер, </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></DIV>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18pt; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 18px"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">видеорегистратор, </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></DIV>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18pt; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 18px"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">навигатор, </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></DIV>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18pt; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 18px"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">игровую приставку, </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></DIV>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18pt; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 18px"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">голосовой переводчик </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 18px"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">и т.д. </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></DIV></LI></UL>
<P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18pt; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 18px"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">Представьте, сколько денег вы отдадите за эти устройства по отдельности.</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

object.design_content: Область нажатия

Ведь на данный момент есть смартфоны стоимостью менее 2 тыс. рублей.</SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 22px"><B><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 26px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">Смартфон -&nbsp;это:</SPAN></SPAN></B></SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><B><SPAN style="COLOR: #0066cc; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">Портативный медиаплеер</SPAN></B></SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #0066cc; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><B><SPAN style="COLOR: #0066cc; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">Компьютер</SPAN></B></SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #0066cc; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">И конечно, не стоит забывать про «базовые» функции:</SPAN></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; DIRECTION: ltr; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0in; WORD-BREAK: normal; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="COLOR: #0066cc; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><B>Фото/видео камера</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; DIRECTION: ltr; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0in; WORD-BREAK: normal; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="COLOR: #0066cc">МРЗ плеер</SPAN></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; DIRECTION: ltr; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0in; WORD-BREAK: normal; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="COLOR: #0066cc; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%">Фонарик</SPAN></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; DIRECTION: ltr; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0in; WORD-BREAK: normal; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="COLOR: #0066cc; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%">Будильник</SPAN></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; DIRECTION: ltr; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0in; WORD-BREAK: normal; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="COLOR: #0066cc; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%">Диктофон</B></SPAN></SPAN></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; DIRECTION: ltr; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0in; WORD-BREAK: normal; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS; COLOR: #0066cc"><B>Телефон…</B></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS; FONT-SIZE: 24px">Если клиенту необходимы хотя<SPAN style="COLOR: black; language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"> </SPAN>бы некоторые из этих функций – выбор очевиден – смартфон.</SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%">Покупая смартфон, вы не тратите лишние деньги, вы экономите, покупая <B><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff">менее, чем за&nbsp;2 тыс.рублей (МТС 970)</SPAN></B> и навигатор, и фотокамеру, и компьютер, и видеорегистратор, и медиаплеер!</SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

object.design_content: Область нажатия

object.content:
<ietext><text><P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS; COLOR: #0080ff; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="COLOR: #400000"><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><B>Удобно!</B> Предложи&nbsp;к смартфону: </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></P>
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS; COLOR: #0080ff; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="COLOR: #400000"><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><B><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff">второе&nbsp;зарядное устройство&nbsp;в автомобиль или на работу + внешний аккумулятор и&nbsp;режим энергосбережения. </SPAN></B></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></P>
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS; COLOR: #0080ff; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="COLOR: #400000"><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000">&nbsp;Они помогут&nbsp;продлить время работы смартфона.</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%">
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><B><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000">Приступим ко второму разделу "Операционные системы".</SPAN></B></SPAN></P>
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">Смартфоны от обычных телефонов отличаются тем, что на них стоит <B><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff">операционная система, позволяющая инсталлировать полноценные программы и игры.</SPAN></B></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana"> <P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">Операционная система, в отличие от прошивки, является в той или иной мере "конструктором". Она позволяет заменить предустановленный браузер на другой, который больше нравится обладателю, разрешает поставить симпатичный медиаплеер, а также установить сотни и тысячи других программ.</SPAN></P></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana">
<P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">На данный момент существует около десятка ОС для смартфонов, но самые распространенными являются:</SPAN></P>
<UL>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><B><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff">Android</DIV>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify>iOS</DIV>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify>Windows Phone</SPAN></B></SPAN></DIV></LI></UL></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

object.content: <ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 18px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana"> <P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><B>Преимущества каждой из ОС:</B></SPAN></P></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"> <P align=justify><B><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">iOS</SPAN></B> - <SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">интуитивно понятный интерфейс.</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"> <P align=left><FONT color=#0000c1><B><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><SPAN style="COLOR: #008000">Android</B> </SPAN></FONT>-&nbsp;<SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">настройка всей визуальной оболочки смартфона под любые запросы пользователя.</SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%"> <P align=left><B><SPAN style="COLOR: #0000c1"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS; COLOR: #0080ff"><SPAN style="COLOR: #cc0e19">Windows Phone</SPAN></SPAN></B>&nbsp;<SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">-&nbsp;&nbsp;- более длительная работа без подзарядки (за счет оптимизированного программного кода ОС).</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

object.design_content: Область нажатия

object.content:
<ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%">
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">1. Операционная система <B><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff">iOS </SPAN></B>принадлежит компании <B><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff">Apple</SPAN></B>, устанавливается только на смартфонах <B><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff">iPhone.</SPAN></B></SPAN></P>
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">2. Операционная система <SPAN style="COLOR: #008000"><B>Android</B></SPAN> - принадлежит компании <SPAN style="COLOR: #008000"><B>Google</B></SPAN>, устанавливается в основном на телефонах<B><SPAN style="COLOR: #008000"> Samsung, HTC, LG</SPAN></B>,&nbsp;а также на некоторых <B><SPAN style="COLOR: #008000">других смартфонах </SPAN></B>различных компаний.</SPAN></P>
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">3. Операционная система <B><SPAN style="COLOR: #9c0000"><SPAN style="COLOR: #cc0e19">Windows Phone</SPAN> </SPAN></B>- компании <SPAN style="COLOR: #cc0e19"><B>Microsoft</B></SPAN>. Устанавливается в основном на телефонах компании <B><SPAN style="COLOR: #cc0e19">Nokia</B> </SPAN>(примерно 80 %),&nbsp; а также на некоторых телефонах таких компаний, как&nbsp;<B><SPAN style="COLOR: #cc0e19">HTC,Huawei и др.</SPAN></B></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%">
<P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><B>Наиболее распространенные приложения для ОС:</B></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P align=justify><FONT face=Calibri></FONT>&nbsp;</P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%">
<P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS; COLOR: #0080ff; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><B>Для офиса:</B></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">Практически каждый из нас нуждается в работе с офисными документами: excel, word, pdf и прочими. Они нужны&nbsp;как для работы, так и для учебы. Благодаря этим приложениям можно просматривать и редактировать многие файлы, а также отправлять их по почте или на облачный сервис.</SPAN></SPAN></FONT></P></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%">
<UL>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify><FONT face=Calibri></FONT><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><B>Smart office 2</DIV>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify>Documents To Go</B></SPAN></DIV></LI></UL></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%">
<P align=justify><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS; COLOR: #0080ff; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><B>Для навигации и путешествия:</B></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff">
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="COLOR: #0080ff"><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">Благодаря этим приложениям с легкостью можно найти нужное место, проложить маршрут, найти интересные места, путешествовать по городу и при этом не волноваться, что заблудитесь, а также видеть всю информацию о пробках на дорогах, что позволит сэкономить много времени в перемещении по городу.</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></FONT></P></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%">
<UL>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify><B><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">Yandex навигатор</DIV>
<LI>
<DIV align=justify>2GIS</SPAN></B></DIV></LI></UL></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

object.design_content: Область нажатия

object.content:
<ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 24px; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-style-textfill-type: solid; mso-style-textfill-fill-themecolor: text1; mso-style-textfill-fill-color: black; mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha: 100.0%">
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #0080ff; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><B>1. Вконтакте</B></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #0080ff; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><STRONG>2. Facebook</STRONG></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #0080ff; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><STRONG>3. Одноклассники</STRONG> </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #0080ff; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">4. <B>Y</B><B>outube</B> (дает возможность просматривать многочисленные видеоролики, известные всему миру)</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #0080ff; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">5. <B>S</B><STRONG>hazam</STRONG> (позволяет определить исполнителя&nbsp;песни той или иной звучащей&nbsp;мелодии)</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #0080ff; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS">6. <B>SPB TV </B>(превращает смартфон в телевизор с многочисленным количеством каналом)</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #0080ff; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><B>7. Skype</B> (позволяет&nbsp;общаться с людьми&nbsp;в режиме реального времени с возможностью передачи видео, т.е. можно видеть собеседника при разговоре)&nbsp;</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 18px"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Verdana; COLOR: #0080ff; FONT-SIZE: 24px"><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Trebuchet MS"><B>8.&nbsp;</B>И множеством других.</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>
